# 10.0 Docs

> Documentation for 10.0 Docs.

- [Default .NET container tags now use Ubuntu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/10.0/default-images-use-ubuntu.md): Learn about the breaking change where the default .NET container tags, like `10.0`, use Ubuntu.
